# Implementation Docs

## Code samples

- [Unit testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/testing.md): Learn how to unit test with .NET Orleans.

## Implementation details

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/index.md): Explore the various implementation details in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain directory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/grain-directory.md): Explore the implementation of the grain directory in .NET Orleans.
- [Orleans lifecycle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/orleans-lifecycle.md): Learn the various lifecycles of .NET Orleans apps.
- [Messaging delivery guarantees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/messaging-delivery-guarantees.md): Learn about messaging delivery guarantees in .NET Orleans.
- [Scheduling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/scheduler.md): Explore the scheduling overview in .NET Orleans.
- [Cluster management](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/cluster-management.md): Learn about cluster management in .NET Orleans.
- [Load balancing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/implementation/load-balancing.md): Learn how .NET Orleans manages load balancing.
